name: The Social Tweep
tag_list: social-media, marketing, brand, management, twitter, facebook, technorati, mashable, tweeps, development, contest, giveaway
overview: The Social Tweep is a social media marketing and brand management company specializing in campaigns on Twitter and Facebook, as well as SEO through social media, social networking and manual submission to blogs, search engines and high-traffic bookmarking sites. Campaigns are customized to each clients business needs, encompassing both Social Media Marketing and Search Engine Optimization to create buzz about the brand. An additional tool used by The Social Tweep is social media contests and giveaways as a means to draw in additional “eyes” on the brand and increase website traffic.
